entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
